subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
Venture Capital
I'm sorry for my intrusion; I got your contact from London Chambers of
Commerce and Industry.
We are a United Kingdom based venture capital firm which specializes
in growth capital investments for existing companies and Start up
business.
We are looking to invest in entrepreneurial teams with big ideas and a
need for seed capital to turn their ideas into great companies, We
believe every business man or woman is basically an entrepreneur, for
we all strive to achieve optimal goals using limited resources.
In seeking out worthwhile investment opportunities, we are ready to
invest in project developments and business ventures that can generate
at least 10% ROI per year. Our offer for investment is based purely on
Loan / Debt Financing basis on 2% yearly interest pay back throughout
the duration of the collaboration.
We have the financial capacity to grant a loan/funding of between $5M
to  $10Billion for a duration of 2 to 20 years, with 6 to 12 months
grace period,  depending on the size and nature of your business.
Should there be any available partnership or investment options and or
openings for new investors within your firm, we will be happy if
obliged
Yours faithfully,
EDWIN BRIGHT

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Edwin Bright,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this interesting opportunity. It's great to hear about your venture capital firm and the support you provide to startups and existing businesses.

I'm curious, could you share more about the types of businesses or industries that your firm typically invests in? Also, what are some of the successful projects or companies that your firm has previously invested in?

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Geraldine
